reviews.review: Best Solo Game EVER!!!!

Плюсы и минусы вы можете почитать в других обзорах.

Я из тех людей кому не нравились первые биошоки. Дада. Я крайне скептически относился и к этой части, решил поиграть только после того как купил на распродаже. И что вы думаете? Я подсел. 

В самом начале игры, когда мы плывём на лодке я думал, опять какой-то маяк, куча воды. В маяке я подумал, ну отлично, опять эти безумные психи. Но после "приезда" в город, когда я увидел очень яркие цвета, я понял, вот это будет уже совсем другое приключение.

P.S. Обычно я предугадываю концовки и развитие сюжета. Но только не в этом случае. Безумно рад.

10 напёрстков из 10 пальцев!
Best game ive ever played.
This game KICKS ASS. It will through you through twists and turns. Bioshock has Fluid Gameplay and an amazing storyline. The ending will amaze you and Leave you wanting more.

One of the most fantastic games I have played and it just leaves your jaw on the floor the entire time and especially at the end. If you enjoy games that transcend their own medium and become pieces of art and masterpieces then you should play this game.

"Bring us the girl, and wipe away the debt."  Yeah, I'm totally going to regret some decisions I don't remember ever making here, aren't I?

Seriously, this is an entertaining first person shooter game that has great graphics.  Gameplay feels most polished of the Bioshocks and the fps controls are the most intuitive.  The story is sufficiently deranged for my perversions, as I'm totally into altering my reality with mindblowing drugs that change my DNA while I follow some cute chick time travelling through alternate dimensions armed to the teeth.

P.S.  just don't buy the dlcs--the story content is not worth the super short playthrough, even on sale.

This is amazing! So freakin' true! So much everything true about our freakin' planet burning down to the deepest hell because of false morality and no humanity! 
I fell in love with BioShock Infinite literally with the first button push! It is perfect. Starting with the plot twisting madly and ending with Mozart's music playing at some location (exactly my favorite - Requiem) - everything is simply perfect. 
The burning world of cruelty where it is impossible to recognize friends or foes: people, machines - everyne wants to kill you because they were told to. But there is the only one. A young beautiful girl, her pain becoming man's anger, her dreams becoming man's goals. The story is so beautiful... I can't wait to know the end, but i'm stuck with a battle difficult as hell.
I always believed that games are like mirrors of reality. And holy ... I'm so right. Yes. This game is the ugly truth about the world of false morality whatever the sourse is. Humanity and love are the only true morality. 
I love the characters - they are so classical, but so fresh and mystical! Increadable. 
Fine system of hints. Also I like that Elisabeth helps with health, money, ammo and salts and also makes some hints. But, I have to say, the saving system is so and so: there's nothing better than our old friend «Esc → Save». 
In general... of course 10 out of 10. Just go and play this.
Great Game 15/10

After dark ambient of first two games this one's ambient is "shine bright like a diamonds" (lol sory try to stop myself it didn't work)...
i could not even go to sleep without seeing what is gonna happend at the end ... and totally worh it actually more than "worth it" No one would have expected this !
There is only one worst part of this game is the...i really want to play another bioshock games but not sure after that ending there sill be more game like this ...still keeping my fingers crossed...

Best shooter I ever played
amazing story
and very short dlc
but buuuuuuuut 
You must play it immediately!
Comecei 7 da noite, quando olhei o relógio eram 3 da manhã e eu não conseguia parar

No puedo creer lo increiblemente grato que resultó este juego y meterse en la piel de DeWitt. Los readores de esta historia son unos genios y uno nunca está quieto.

Puede resultar un poco confuso con el tema de los desgarros, pero luego todo tiene sentido. 10/10

Bishock Infinite ist wie ich finde ein absolut gelungenes Ende der Trilogie. Zwar hat es eher weniger mit der Vorgeschichte in Rapture zu tun, dennoch bietet es eine noch viel tiefgründigere, vom gleichen Schlag kommende, neue Geschichte, die sich in einer zu Rapture beinahe parallelen Welt abspielt. Es hat zwar ein, zwei Mängel, wie zum Beispiel ab und zu auftretende Grafikfehler oder im Kampf eingefrohrene Gegner, macht diese jedoch durch die bombastische Grafik, flüssig laufende Engine und mitreißende Story zunichte.
Alles in allem ein sehr gutes Spiel und für jeden Fan der Reihe ein Muss!
Such a great game you can adventure around,buy new gear just overall all the parts wich should fit into a great story are there MOST POSITIVLY RECOMMEND THIS GAME :D :D :3
Just just!! PLAY IT FOR THE ENDING IS LIKE OH MY MERLINS BEARD HOW WHAT!?!?!

It is not bad but if there is one thing I loathe it is fixed save points, which is why I consider their introduction a very bad move. I quite like to experiment and sometimes also try stupid things just for a laugh. Neither Bioshock 1 or 2 had fixed save points and that makes part 3 a bit of a disappointment for me. (So my recommendation is more a kind of yes with a substantial but ;-).)

Я аж аху.ел
20/10
Bioshock nada mas. Exelente en todo aspecto. Una joya...

AMAZING story, wonderful characters, one of the best games I've ever played, but in my opinion it should be a bit longer.

Absolutely fascinating atmosphere. Brilliant story and brilliant character details. This game must win the Oscar prize!!!

Bioshock infinite è davvero un bel gioco ! 
personalmente mi è piaciuto molto ! 
La storia è davvero mozzafiato anche se dura un po poco la si può finire in poco meno di due giorni, Lo consiglio agli amanti della trilogia. La grafica non lascia a desiderare ed è curata davvero bene come i personaggi e i loro caratteri !

The final major storyline of the Bioshock universe (at least in games). The storyline is mind-blowing excluding the fact they have well combat system and unique graphical art technique.

Investments of our understand of previous Bioshock games is fulfilled.

If you like a good story, this is it. They should have a "Hell yeah!" button for recommendation.

Side note: After you are done with Episode 2 of this game, go to wiki to piece up the puzzles (where you don't get it during the game). You'll certainly be mind-blown.
kinda fun
Still the worst decision I've made in my life.

A great game, though it does feel a little short. However the story is amazing ;bewarn that you will probably be confused with the story if you didn't pay attention. The graphics of the game is rather well done, I really like the character design, though some may find it to be slightly too 'cartoonish'. The thing i really like about this game is how easy it is to be absorbed into the atmosphere created by the game, and yet the game can change the atmosphere so quickly. I would recommend it to any person, despit the fact that some may have not played other Bioshock series.
God game. NIce and confusing story but worth every penny
Awesome

По моему мнению это лучшая сюжетно-ориентированная игра, которую сложно представить в формате книги или фильма. Проходить рекомендуется 2 раза. Первый, чтобы офигевать от истории, второй - чтобы чувствовать себя идиотом, ведь так много вещей, пасхалок и отсылок отвечало на сюжетные загадки.

Начало титров сопроводилось глубоким вдохом и грустным выдохом...
10/10
If you haven't played this already... What the heck is wrong with you?!
Really fun game with a few little twists here and there.
Beautiful game! 10/10
shit stroy shit game

If you are a fan of this series, you should absolutely grab this game. Similar gameplay as the previous ones but for me, it is never boring. Very addictive. Recommend paying attention to the sotry and all dialogues. The plot and the story is 11/10. Everything else is about 9.
Não tenho nada a relatar desse jogo 10/10

Incredible graphics, great storyline, definite replay value, overall great game

Buy, but only when its on sale $5. Definitely a console port, found it easy even on the hardest settings. story's a little convoluted. What is definitely worth playing? original bio shock, far superior

Beautiful game
Everyone must play it
Beautifully detailed world with set piece battles and a well-paced mind bending story.  What a gloriously fun ride.  A true masterpiece.

Ending had more holes than , well the ending,  mediocre game with terrible, loooong  drawn out ending.  Glad I got it on cheap sale. No choices ?  Just watch and open a door when told to.   Just an AWEFULL ending.
Awesome atmosphere, smooth gameplay, beautiful graphics, compelling story...what more can you ask for? 10/10

Very beautiful.  The setting is absolutely fantastic. Combat isn't great, but it's generally not annoying and can be enjoyable. Really weird and confusing story, as usual. Turn on 90s mode for a real challenge. Really fun. Highly recommend.

Next to The Last of Us, this is one of my favorite games in a LONG time. I spent a lot of time in this universe and will most likely be back. If you want to be engrossed in the world around you this is the game to play. The gun and vigor gameplay is solid. It's visually beautiful. STRONGLY voice acted. Amazing story. If you love the art side of games, PLAY THIS GAME. It's one of those games you're gonna think about long after you've left...
all bioshock is awesome this is no slouch either

After finishing this game I was so emotionally drained I just sat and watched through all the credits. This game has quite possibly the best story in any game ever not to mention the best art style and premise. I would recommend anybody and everybody to play this masterpiece of gaming design.

Сюжет, Геймплей, Атмосфера, Элизабет
10/10
this is the nice game Because it do very well about performance, feeling of the character
I think this game has a good story and gameplay system.So cool
Very good game , the art section is amazing , the only poblema I found is the duration but  its expected, its an FPS

A pretty good shooter game with a pretty good sci-fi story, slightly obscured by some heavy-handed social commentary.  Go back to rapture, but in the sky this time.  Use some pretty cool weapons, and some nearly exact copies of those pretty cool weapons to defeat a moderately varied list of enemies while unravelling the plot (wait for the TWIST)!  Meanwhile learn all about the evils of... well anything taken to its straw-maniess extreme.

The "fight a stream of bad guys to win a prize" add on didn't bring much to the table, but can be a challenge if you like that sort of thing.

Verdict:  decent FPS, just short of the original, and a good find if it is on sale.

i should stop falling in love with fictional characters...
10/10 will fight to protect her again

After beating the game, you'll want to play it again. 
I love story driven games and this one is.. one of the best I've ever played.
It made my jaw drop - literally.
11/10

Игра очень классная, лучшая из серии, хотя особо сравнивать то и нельзя, поменяли 80% игры. Атмосферы старого биошока нету, но это даже лучше, ибо первых двух подводных частей хватило.
Прошел с удовольствием ни разу не наскучило. Сюжет очень затягивающий, концовка убила. 10/10.

Honestly i was happily suprrised with this game, i thought it was going to be just another fps but it was way more technical than "just any fps" . First of all the vigors are new and inventive (i enjoy the upgraded crows vigor myself) then there is the sky-line system which makes the maps só much larger and really enjoyable. Third the weapons are great and feel really nice to handle, upgrading items is also a reallly nice mechanic. Fourth the graphics are just awe-inspiring and last : the story, while at times a bit hard to follow once you figure out what's going on and why things are happening it's an absolute mindblow. No spoilers here but just play the game and find out for yourself. All with all i recommend this game a lot, I hope you enjoy your wonderfull trip to Columbia!

Un pure chef d'oeuvre le jeu et jute "Wouaou", un scénario avec des rebondissement, une bande son à en faire jouir vos oreille et un univers rechercher (mélange entre les années 1910 et le steampunk )
Bioshock вызвал у меня море положительных эмоций, когда проходил его у друга. Сейчас пройдя его снова, я получил не меньше эмоций. Bioshock Infinite - это must have....покупайте, вы не пожалеете

I usually never play games like this, although I've always wanted to. I was always so bad at games like this, which is why I never did. So when I wanted to finally start, I chose this game to be the first one I would play. Now I'm glad I did. Finished this game and it is by far, one of the best games I've ever played. Beautiful story, great gameplay, and it definitely makes you get the feels. I loved having Elizabeth as my companion and I don't think any game I'll play from now on will ever make me feel connected to someone as well as Elizabeth and Bioshock Infinite did. Everyone should play this game at least once in their lives.

マジで面白かった

10/10点
final kl rompe craneos .-.
Brilliant. I'm a big tough guy, and this made me cry.

There's a really amazing story to experience here with some fantastic set-piece moments. I'm not personally a fan of the excessive looting, but there's plenty of great things to find like the Voxophones which give you better insight into the backstory of the game. I can easily recommend playing through on Easy just to experience the story.

The best FPS with story I ever played in my life time.

/Spoiler Alert/

As some of you know time is one factor that most master peice has. Ocarina of time, Back to the Future, or some other books that I haven't read. As I play through I could assume what's going to happen and even assume the endint but no. The ending in this game is probably the most unpredictable ending ever and I think this story can be a great peice of work even as a book or movie. Like most FPS games, you do have some weapon upgrades and looking for some money for it can be a little difficult. You'll need to look carefully around every place you go if you want better weapon. That I found a little hard. The strange magic-ish abilities seem to be very useful but I found myself using it less than guns.

As you expected from the series it offers rich storyline with insane gunfights with the advantage of vigor....doesnt mean you wont get your arse kicked.  Some gunfights are excitingly crazy be proficient with vigor and gun toggling you are gonna need it...Im a huge fan since the beginning of the series plot is kinda hard to follow sometime religious zealots pretty much but great game in an awesome series.

Perhaps the best game i ever play. Story, worlds, picture, gameplay and Girl is perfect. 
Despite the fact that I do not particularly like shooters, but i thought it's more than common action. This is the story and atmosphere that will remember a very long time.
Stunning. Absolutely incredible. The gold standard for story-based FPS's. I would absolutely 100% recommend you buy this game.
Pretty linear but awesome story.
Not very reminiscent of the other Bioshock games, but still has a lot to bring to the FPS table. Beautiful scenery and engaging characters.

Что могу сказать про эту игру, только одно хорошее,вы задаетесь вопросом покупать ее или нет? Конечно покупать епта! Без раздумий покупать, очень реалистичная, классная графика верней обалденная, игра 100 процентов вовлечет вас в нее .
офигенная игра в плане отмосферы и сюжета, советую пройти её каждому так как там очень глубокий смысл!

[i] I really want to write a full fledged review outlining why this game is breathtaking in every sense of the word, but it's impossible to do. The only word that comes to mind when I try to describe this game is "beautiful".[/i]

I have played this game three times over. I have just bought the game on Steam to play it a fourth time. Let that speak for itself.

Edit: Just finished my [strike]fourth[/strike] [strike]fifth[/strike] [strike]sixth[/strike] [strike]seventh[/strike] eighth playthrough. No matter how much I think I'm done with Bioshock I have to play the games over again. Each time I play this game I learn or understand the plot more than the last time, making me want to to do it over and over and over yet again. Every word and every detail means something. The characters, you won't forget their names. Trust me. 

Plus Elizabeth is [strike]hot[/strike] a well-define and a wonderful character, I mean that's always a bonus.

[i] I wouldn't describe many games as art, but this game is. This game embodies art in every form... voice, song, design, graphics, animation, and screen play.[/i]
This is a good game. I give it two thumbs up.
Epic Story!!!
Best Game in the bioshock series, bought the game and season pass bundle and i couldnt be happier. If you want a good Fps then this is one of them.
beat this game in 1998 mode on xbox, 10/10 best ending ever would play for a third time
Amazing
Would buy on sale but nowhere else.
Simplesmente uma obra de arte!
Este jogo consegue fazer nos dias de hoje o que o Half Life fez a 10 anos atrás.
Meiner Meinung nach nicht das beste Bioshock, aber dennoch eins der besten Spiele allgemein.

Além de muito bonito e de ter uma história única, muito bem elaborada e trabalhada - este jogo é uma das raras instâncias em que um NPC é tão legal que você acaba realmente se importando com ele. 
Além de interessante, Elizabeth é UTIL! Nintendo precisando e muito aprender como fazer um Companion que preste - este é o jogo pra mostrar como fazer tudo certo.
Além disso - a trilha sonora. Genial em todos os aspectos, principalmente no fato de ela estar fortemente atrelada à história do jogo.
